mapper.sql: WarehouseIncome_Id, Refund_Name, Refund_Date, BookDelivery_Id, Refund_details, Refund_Count, TotalMoney, AddName, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, ApprovalName, ApprovalTime, Approval, RevokeAppName, RevokeAppTime,TimeLiness
mapper.select:
select
from WarehouseIncome
Approval = 0
and Approval = 1
and AddTime between #{value1} and #{value2}
and AddName like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{input},'%'))
and TimeLiness=0
order by AddTime desc
mapper.update: update WarehouseIncome set Approval=1 ,ApprovalName=#{approvalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ApprovalTime=#{approvaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where WarehouseIncome_Id = #{warehouseincomeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update WarehouseIncome set Approval=0 ,RevokeAppName=#{revokeappname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},RevokeAppTime=#{revokeapptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where WarehouseIncome_Id = #{warehouseincomeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from WarehouseIncome where TimeLiness=0 order by AddTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into WarehouseIncome (Refund_Name, Refund_Date, BookDelivery_Id, Refund_details, Refund_Count, TotalMoney, AddName, AddTime) values (#{refundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bookdeliveryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refundDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update WarehouseIncome
Refund_Name = #{refundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Refund_Date = #{refundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BookDelivery_Id = #{bookdeliveryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Refund_details = #{refundDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Refund_Count = #{refundCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UseCash = #{usecash,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TotalMoney = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AddName = #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ApprovalName = #{approvalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ApprovalTime = #{approvaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Approval = #{approval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RevokeAppName = #{revokeappname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RevokeAppTime = #{revokeapptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where WarehouseIncome_Id = #{warehouseincomeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update WarehouseIncome set Refund_Name = #{refundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Refund_Date = #{refundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BookDelivery_Id = #{bookdeliveryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Refund_details = #{refundDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Refund_Count = #{refundCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UseCash = #{usecash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TotalMoney = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AddName = #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ApprovalName = #{approvalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ApprovalTime = #{approvaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Approval = #{approval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RevokeAppName = #{revokeappname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RevokeAppTime = #{revokeapptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where WarehouseIncome_Id = #{warehouseincomeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
